ygData.subject: Stand of in the ARK.
ygData.msgSnippet: Standing before Scourge.... I see, Not clearly convinced. More leary of him now than before. & the others with you, who are they? she questioned coolly.

Standing before Scourge.... 

"I see," Not clearly convinced. More leary of him now than before. 

"& the others with you, who are they?" she questioned coolly. 
 FoxManRoar1 [1:29 AM]:  He looked down at her his inner cooling 
system boiling. "They are my men, on loan, and if you must know no 
other decepticon could be trusted with this mission, megatron and the 
others would have killed prime, and the quto bots would have did like 
wise to megatron, if either die, i die, so i am the great equalizer." 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:32 AM]:  She somewhat cocked a brow. Though small, 
she was still as tall & brave as she was in the past. "That still 
sdoes not answer my question... Scourge," Stressing upon his name.  
 FoxManRoar1 [1:35 AM]:  "You may have seen the black cats body 
within, he is Mirage the blue and white bot of the qutobots, the 
dinosaurs are the dinobots, and their Leader/king Grimlock, and this 
young one is my second and most trusted in command Quetzalcoatl, and 
you I assume are Megatron's mistress?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:38 AM]:  She glanced at the others, they were 
indeed different from last she recalled them. Both disturbing.. yet, 
comforting to know others from her own generation there. 

She then looked up at Scourge, but said nothing in response to the 
name of "mistress".. it was so.. organic to her. However, in the 
past, she was something like that.. more of an equal to him... 
fighrting at his side or as he so ordered like a very loyal 
soldier... 

 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:39 AM]:  "I am Maxima," she glanced at Mirage & 
the Dinotbots, "I'm sure they are well aware of me."  
 FoxManRoar1 [1:41 AM]:  "They have no say in any of this, I am the 
leader, they live because i let them, they fight if i tell them, they 
jump if i say jump, or else." Scourge looked her over. "Megatron 
never mentioned you to me other then name." "Your more feminie then i 
thought." 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:44 AM]:  She nodded & understood. She never let 
feelings show. Her supposed feelings for him was clouded by deep 
loyalty & devotion to him & the Decepticon cause. To prove that she 
could be a great warrior. 

"A slight... issue & problem with this form than I would wish. That 
is hopefully to be changed... IF I can get a certain Maximal to 
recreate my old form."  
 FoxManRoar1 [1:47 AM]:  He laughed. "Why not use one of our C R 
Chambers?" He transformed and stood before her as the Black 18Wheeler.
